dict.acceptation: 比较，对照；[语]比喻；比较级；

sent.orig: It is including similar comparison, upward comparison and downward comparison.
sent.trans: 社会比较可分为相似比较、向上比较和向下比较。

sent.orig: By studying the point-to-point comparison method author presented a new algorithm based on point-to-point comparison method.
sent.trans: 通过对逐点比较法的研究，在逐点比较法的基础上提出了一种基于逐点比较法的新算法。

sent.orig: Measure their progress and not others comparison, but they have their own past comparison.
sent.trans: 衡量自己进步不是和别人比较，而是和自己的过去比较。

sent.orig: Compared with divides into the longitudinal comparison and the crosswise comparison.
sent.trans: 比较分为纵向比较和横向比较。

sent.orig: The non confluent property, comparison theorem and strong comparison theorem of strong solutions are proved.
sent.trans: 证明了强解的不合流性，比较定理及强比较定理。
